rule_ids.description: Unique guideline ID or IDs that were violated.

line_no.description: Line number of the violation. MUST be identical to the input.

bad_code.description: the original code that was bad. MUST be identical to the input.

code_fix.description: valid code which fixes the bad_code. MUST be code (but NOT just a code comment).

general_suggestion.description: a natural language suggestion for fixing the bad_code. MUST NOT be code.

comment.description: a comment about the violation. MUST be identical to the input.

source.description: the source of the comment. MUST be identical to the input.

status.description: status of the comment, can be 'KEEP' or 'REMOVE'

status_reason.description: the reasoning used to determine the status of the comment. This should be a short sentence explaining why the comment was kept or removed.
